text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Nobody is being blamed for the coronavirus- it’s a virus not a hate crime. The administration is being held to account is the response to date. Tell the American people the truth, that’s all we ask! Don’t filter info because it may make you look bad. People dying is what’s bad!

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
